title: From manure to megawatts: Navigating the sustainable innovation solution through biogas production from livestock waste for harnessing green energy for green economy
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Mohsen Brahmi, Bruna Bruno, Karambir Singh Dhayal, Luca Esposito, Anna Parziale
